item.title: ROW Permit Review
item.description:
ROW Permit Review is a configuration of the Crowdsource Polling application that can be used by government agencies to review right of way permit applications and offer comments during the review process.

Learn more
tags: ds.Local Government.Manage Right of Way Activities
item.snippet: ROW Permit Review is a configuration of the Crowdsource Polling application that can be used by government agencies to review right of way permit applications and offer comments during the review process.

values.title: ROW Permit Review
values.displayText:
Welcome to ROW Permit Review

ROW Permit Review can be used by used by government agencies to review right of way permit applications and offer comments during the review process.

Search for a location or click an item in the list to get started.
values.socialMediaDisclaimer: Choose how you would like to sign in to this application. The name associated with your social media account will be added to any comments you post.
values.commentPeriodDialogContent: We are no longer accepting comments for this project.
values.submitMessage: Thank you. Your comment has been submitted.

item.title: ROW Permit Public Comment
item.description:
ROW Permit Public Comment is a configuration of the Crowdsource Polling application that can be used by the general public and interested parties to review permit applications and comment on proposed construction activity.

Learn more
tags: ds.Local Government.Manage Right of Way Activities
item.snippet: ROW Permit Public Comment is a configuration of the Crowdsource Polling application that can be used by the general public and interested parties to review permit applications and comment on proposed construction activity.

values.title: ROW Permit Public Comment
values.displayText:
Welcome to ROW Permit Public Comment

ROW Permit Public Comment can be used by the general public and interested parties to review permit applications and comment on proposed construction activity.

Search for a location or click an item in the list to get started.
values.socialMediaDisclaimer: Choose how you would like to sign in to this application. The name associated with your social media account will be added to any comments you post.
values.commentPeriodDialogContent: We are no longer accepting comments for this project.
values.submitMessage: Thank you. Your comment has been submitted.

item.title: ROW Permit Locator
item.description:
ROW Permit Locator is a configuration of Web AppBuilder for ArcGIS that can be used by the general public and other interested parties to locate pending and approved right of way permits in their community.

Learn more
tags: ds.Local Government.Manage Right of Way Activities
item.snippet: ROW Permit Locator is a configuration of Web AppBuilder for ArcGIS that can be used by the general public and other interested parties to locate pending and approved right of way permits in their community.

about.aboutContent:
ROW Permit Locator can be used by the general public and other interested parties to locate pending and approved right of way permits in their community.

Adjust the slider to the desired buffer distance. Search for an address / applicant name in the search bar, or click a location directly on the map to define the location to be buffered. Click a layer in the list of results and click the right-of-way permit you are interested in. Select the Directions tab to view driving directions to the event from the defined location.

item.title: ROW Permit Dashboard
item.description:
ROW Permit Dashboard is a configuration of Operations Dashboard for ArcGIS that can be used by public works executives to monitor the status of right of way permits in their community.

Learn more
tags: ds.Local Government.Manage Right of Way Activities
item.snippet: ROW Permit Dashboard is a configuration of Operations Dashboard for ArcGIS that can be used by public works executives to monitor the status of right of way permits in their community.

leftPanel.title:
ROW Permit Dashboard can be used by public works executives to monitor the status of right of way permits in their community.

 

Adjust the filters or current map extent to refine the results.
